Name: Observable Sample Space
Statement: S_observable << S_complete: exponential to polynomial via local moves

Name: Geometric Triangle Inequality
Statement: d(a:c) <= d(a:b) + d(b:c) separates S_obs from S_complete

Name: NFA-DFA Collapse
Statement: n! NFA states collapse to O(n^2) DFA states

Name: Halting Decidability
Statement: Bounded programs: halting decidable in O(max_steps)

Name: Diagonal Paradox
Statement: D(P) = if HALT(P:P) loop else halt; D(D) is contradiction

Name: Transform Polynomial
Statement: Every NP problem has polynomial transform revealing structure
